name: Chocolate Fear
description:
This is my submission to the Mini-Jam 90 It has been fun and I probably will do another Mini-Jam again in the future.

The game's logic may not make sense but oh well what are ya gonna do :)?

Recommend to read how to play.

You are a being that is called Dreamers your mission is to save a boy whose only 'Character' is fear. Dreamers can enter people's dreams and they are known to try to save people from having heart attacks from nightmares. Even though the dream is just an illusion people can still die from heart attacks and this boy is very scared so it's your job to save him. When people are so scared they freeze up and when it happens in a dream time freezes and that will give you two seconds to kill their fears if you don't the person will die.

How To Play

WASD = MOVE

E = INTERACT

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON TO SHOOT (When time is frozen)

P = PAUSE 

Consume 20 chocolates and avoid a heart attack. Once you have 20 chocolates you need your BPM to be in the green, then once you are there will be an arrow to show you the direction.

Sorry about the quit buttons not working right in the WebGL version.

The music that was in the credits scene: "Royalty Free Music from Bensound"

The game music: https://bit.ly/3B1zpsJ

Font: https://www.dafont.com/stanberry.font?l[]=10&l[]=1
